column4: This might be a stupid question, but my BIOS battery in my netbook is getting discharged when I leave it off some time. Is the BIOS battery recharging when AC power is plugged in, and the netbook battery removed?
BIOS batteries has a tendency to go bad with age, in my experience.. they just won't hold a charge any more. I think it's meant to be loaded whenever there is power to the system
it's not really anything you can do about it from the software side of things.. sometimes you can replace the battery but sometimes it's just welded on
